item.description:
Lets socialize and converse in Portuguese and enjoy tapas and live music and maybe some dancing.

Congas is a tapas restaurant and bar.
On Wednesday night, Congas will turn in a Brazilian live music and dance venue.

My idea is to meet at 7:30 pm and enjoy conversation before the music begins.

I understand that some people may only be coming for the music.
Please let me know if you want to be included in the 7:30pm table reservaton.

From 9 PM until 12 AM, Receita de Samba featuring the lovely Brazilian vocalist Anna Borges along with Bill Ward on guitar and vocals, Jose Pienasola on bass, Fabio Saffi on drums,
Amir Milstein on flute and Gabriel Meireles on percussion wll perform.

Listen to the music of Receita de Samba

Conga Restaurant

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU

$10 cash cover charge for entry


MBTA:
Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to plan your public transportation route. Less than five (5) minute walk from Harvard subway station on the Red Line and the last stop of the #1 and #66 buses on Mass Ave in Harvard Square.

DRIVING DIRECTIONS:
Check out Google to plan your driving route

PARKING:
Very limited parking at meters on Brattle, Dunster and JFK Streets as well as Massachusetts Avenue.
Check out Harvard Square Public Parking for garages and lots.

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Portuguese Conversation, Tapas, and live Samba Music
